summary: This is an email exchange between an FBI Special Agent and a courtroom sketch artist regarding sketches from the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The FBI agent inquires about obtaining a copy of a sketch that may depict them, and the artist responds positively, promising to look for it.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI agent from the New York Field Office, working on the Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Desk, emails a courtroom sketch artist to inquire about obtaining a copy of a sketch from the Maxwell trial that may depict them.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Trial
events.description: The criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell, referenced as the source of the courtroom sketches being discussed.

keyFacts: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Desk was potentially sketched during the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The agent is seeking to obtain a copy of the courtroom sketch from the trial through correspondence with the sketch artist.
The email exchange demonstrates post-trial follow-up activities by law enforcement involved in the case.
